displayTopicName: First Pass of _hashta b’shlucho mekadesh bo meboy_

tokens.text: hashta b’shlucho mekadesh bo meboy

First Pass of hashta b’shlucho mekadesh.text: For the first pass, we'll translate the Gemara word for word using Rashi to clarify ambiguities in the text, and then ask clarification questions:
